title: Fix Admin Portal Visibility and Apply Neon Dark Black-and-Green Theme

requirements.text: Ensure the admin portal is fully accessible and visible. The route /admin-login must render the AdminLogin page, and after successful login with credentials (admin/admin123), the user must be redirected to /owner-dashboard. All admin routes (/owner-dashboard, /admin/stock, /admin/sales, /admin/revenue, /admin/customers, /admin/enquiries, /admin/income, /admin/trending, /admin/products, /admin/reports) must be protected by AdminGuard and render correctly inside AdminLayout with the full sidebar navigation. Verify that AdminGuard correctly reads sessionStorage keys 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive' and does not redirect authenticated users away.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /admin-login renders the login form
Logging in with admin/admin123 redirects to /owner-dashboard
All admin sub-routes render their respective pages without redirecting to login when session is active
AdminLayout sidebar is visible on all admin pages with links to all modules

requirements.text: Apply and enforce a neon dark black-and-green theme consistently across the entire application â€” both the admin portal and public-facing pages. The theme must use a near-black background (e.g., #0a0a0a or #0d0d0d), bright neon green accents (e.g., #00ff88 or #39ff14), dark card surfaces, and glowing neon light effects on key interactive elements (buttons, nav links, cards, headings). Update frontend/src/index.css CSS custom properties and frontend/tailwind.config.js color tokens so the neon palette is applied globally. Ensure all pages (Home, Products, About, Contact, AdminLogin, AdminDashboard, OwnerDashboard, StockManagement, SalesPage, etc.) reflect this theme with no remnants of conflicting or default light/blue themes.
acceptanceCriteria: Application background is near-black on all pages
Neon green is used consistently for accents, buttons, links, and highlights across admin and public pages
Cards and panels have dark surfaces with visible neon glow or border effects
No default light or blue theme remnants are visible anywhere
Tailwind config neon color tokens are correctly defined and referenced in components
CSS custom properties in index.css reflect the neon dark palette for both light and dark mode tokens

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Admin login credentials must remain hardcoded as admin/admin123
Session persistence must use sessionStorage keys 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive'
nonGoals: Adding new admin features or pages beyond what already exists
Changing the backend Motoko actor logic
Integrating real authentication or Internet Identity for admin login
